# Exploring Metadata
```{r}
# Read in metadata, setting column "primary_use" to factor rather than character
meta <- read_csv("energydata/building_metadata.csv", col_types=cols(primary_use=col_factor(NULL)))
# Read training dataset. This has 20 million rows. Need to cut it down.
train <- read_csv("energydata/train.csv")
```
